cause.description:
Our mission is to create a community of support for those affected by NF, through education, advocacy, coalitions, and supporting research for treatments and a cure
1. Awareness of Neurofibromatosis
2. Research into gene therapy to find a cure
3. Support to families and individuals touched by this genetic defect
cause.mission: support research into, increase awareness, and provide information to people living with NF1, and NF2
cause.name: Neurofibromatosis
